content:
UpgradeKind UpgradeKind Enum

Definition

Namespace:
Assembly:
System.Fabric.dll

Enumerates the possible kinds of upgrade.

Edit

In this Article

public enum UpgradeKindPublic Enum UpgradeKind

Fields

Invalid Invalid

Indicates that this is an invalid upgrade. All Service Fabric enumerations have a reserved "Invalid" member.
Rolling Rolling

Indicates that this is a rolling upgrade.
Rolling_ForceRestart Rolling_ForceRestart

Indicates that this is a rolling upgrade and the service host restarts.
Rolling_NotificationOnly Rolling_NotificationOnly

Indicates that this is a rolling upgrade and replicas are not restarted.
